thread.title: Adele Is Returning to ‘Saturday Night Live’ with Matthew McConaughey as Host
thread.title_full: Adele Is Returning to ‘Saturday Night Live’ with Matthew McConaughey as Host

title: Adele Is Returning to ‘Saturday Night Live’ with Matthew McConaughey as Host
text:
Adele Is Returning to ‘Saturday Night Live’ with Matthew McConaughey as Host 
Published By: Celebuzz - Today 
Lucky us: a day after her next album drops next month, Adele will be returning to Saturday Night Live as the evening's musical guest....
